level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-58, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3201.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-142, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3201.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: "Notwithstanding section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, the Washington Convention Center Authority Financing Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. 12-402) shall take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act."
